description: Descendant from the original Terraformers released by Earth about a millennium ago, the Xenon underwent many waves of machine evolution. Mechano-taxonometrists are fairly certain that the line of TF/Xenon present in the known sectors today belong to the ninth diversification branch (of roughly 27). The K/BRANCH9 - commonly referred to as just K - is a large destroyer with decent manoeuvrability and an above average weapons system.
name: Xenon K
